title: Story about Klay Thompson and his dad
body: For Klay Thompson of the Golden State Warriors, his family has played a unique role in his success.

title: Jeremy Lin: From Harvard to NBA- the story
Chris Paul Scores 61 Points in High School for His Grandfather
body: Chris Paul scores 61 points in a High School game for his deceased Grandfather who was murdered, one point for every years of his Grandpa's life.

title: The most motivating 8 min of your life!
body: Motivation from the movie's, you can do it! I clumped my favorites together into one mind blowing 8 min clip. Enjoy

title: How bad do you want it?
body: Inspiring clip of the week: How bad do you want it?! (basketball motivation). First Step Talent Development presents: How bad do you want it (inspirational basketball video). Athlete is Randall Williams, Voice over by Eric Thomas (Hiphop preacher) and music by Epic Score!
